name: Vegetable Biryani
description: Made with basmati rice, mixed vegetables, and a blend of aromatic spices like saffron, cumin, cinnamon, and garam masala, cooked together to create a fragrant and flavorful dish.

name: Cauliflower Biryani
description: Made with basmati rice, cauliflower florets, and a mix of spices like cumin, cinnamon, cloves, and garam masala, creating a fragrant and flavorful one-pot dish.

name: Jackfruit Biryani
description: Made with basmati rice, young jackfruit, and a blend of spices like cumin, cloves, cinnamon, and garam masala, creating a savory, aromatic, and hearty biryani.

name: Hyderabadi Veg Biryani
description: Made with basmati rice, mixed vegetables, and a fragrant blend of spices like saffron, garam masala, and mint, cooked in a traditional dum style for a rich and flavorful taste.

name: Tomato Biryani
description: Made with basmati rice, ripe tomatoes, and a blend of spices like cumin, cinnamon, and garam masala, creating a tangy and flavorful biryani.
